product_summary: Zevo.ai is a code visualization tool that helps developers understand their codebase, refactor it, and onboard new developers. It analyzes source code, logs, and cloud infrastructure to provide insights into code dependencies and the contextual meaning of the code.
product_pros: Provides a real-time visualization of your codebase
Analyzes source code, logs, and cloud infrastructure for deeper insights
Maps your codebase to the contextual english meaning of the code
Automatically builds code maps to help you search and understand codebases
Facilitates faster code release by providing a visual snapshot of code flow pre and post-push
product_cons: May not be suitable for very large codebases
Can be expensive for some users
May not be able to handle all types of codebases
May not be able to provide insights into all aspects of your codebase
May not be able to integrate with all development tools

product_usecases.details: Zevo.ai can help you quickly understand the structure and organization of your codebase, even if you're new to the project.
Zevo.ai can help you identify and refactor code that is inefficient, duplicated, or difficult to maintain.
Zevo.ai can help new developers quickly get up to speed on your codebase by providing them with a visual overview of the code and its dependencies.
Zevo.ai can help you quickly identify and review code changes, even if you're not familiar with the codebase.
Zevo.ai can help you monitor your codebase for changes and ensure that your code is always up-to-date.

product_toolfor.details: Zevo.ai is a valuable tool for software developers of all levels, from beginners to experienced professionals.
Zevo.ai can help development teams work more efficiently and effectively by providing them with a shared understanding of the codebase.
Zevo.ai can help project managers track the progress of development projects and identify potential risks.
Zevo.ai can help technical architects design and implement complex software systems.
Zevo.ai can help students learn about software development and how to read and understand code.

product_pricing.details: For students and freelancers. Includes up to 100 MB of codebase, 1 repo, and 1 user.
For startups and small groups. Includes up to 250 MB of codebase, 5 repos, and 5 users.
For mid/large-scale companies. Includes unlimited codebase size, unlimited repos, and unlimited users.
